description: Styles for a 3D tic-tac-toe game application, including root variables, board layout, cell effects, and animations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling with a background gradient and typography settings.

classes.name: board-3d
classes.description: Styling for the 3D perspective of the game board.

classes.name: board-3d-container
classes.description: Container styles for the 3D board, including rotation effects.

classes.name: layer-grid
classes.description: Grid layer styles with 3D transformations and transitions.

classes.name: game-cell
classes.description: Styles for individual game cells with hover and focus effects.

classes.name: winning-line
classes.description: Styles for the winning line effect with animations.
